testcase.name: To validate the functionality that user is able to add education details
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Qualifications module of my info module....................passed When user click on add education............................................passed And user enters degree and isntitute name...................................passed Then user is able to succesfully add education details......................passed

testcase.name: To validate the functionality that user is able to add language
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Qualifications module of my info module....................passed When user click on add language.............................................passed And user selects language and fluency and competency........................passed Then user is able to succesfully add language...............................passed

testcase.name: To validate the functionality that user is able to add work experience
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Qualifications module of my info module....................passed When user click on Add work experience......................................passed And user enters all the necessary details...................................passed Then user is able to succesfully add work experience........................passed

testcase.name: To validate the functionality that user is able to delete selected language
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Qualifications module of my info module....................passed When user checks checkbox of any added language.............................passed And user clicks on delete...................................................passed Then user is able to succesfully delete the corresponding language added....passed

testcase.name: To validate the functionality that user is able to edit and save the personal details
testcase.system-out: Given user is on personal details module of my info module..................passed When user click on edit personal details....................................passed And user enters all the required details....................................passed Then user is able to succesfully save the details...........................passed

testcase.name: To validate user is able to login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome Browser is open................................................passed And user is on OrangeHRM login page.........................................passed When user enters invalid credentials in "Harsha" and "harsha123" text fields.passed Then user is unable to login................................................passed And the page displays error message invalid credentials.....................passed

testcase.name: To validate user is able to login with invalid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome Browser is open................................................passed And user is on OrangeHRM login page.........................................passed When user enters invalid credentials in "admin" and "admin" text fields.....passed Then user is unable to login................................................passed And the page displays error message invalid credentials.....................passed

testcase.name: To validate user is able to login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on login page...................................................passed When user enters valid credentials in username and password text fields.....passed Then user is able to login successfully.....................................passed And user is able to view homepage...........................................passed
